Reviews.Title: Looks are very deceiving
Reviews.Author: Richard A. Cochrane "disappointed"
Reviews.Content: was looking for a smexy cp for a girl's birthday gift. this pink BLU cp seemed perfect. arrived in fast time. written instructions in spanish then very vague english ones. phone configured totally to spanish. unable to find way to change language to english or use a hands-free wired headset which was not supplied or referred to at all. the amazon page featuring the phone says it has a 1.8 megapix camera- it does not. the screen is 1.8 inches, the camera is .3  so sadly i'm returning this to the seller with the hopes that BLU reads this and addresses the language and headset issues and corrects the erroneous claim to a 1.8 mp camera.

Reviews.Title: Headphone does not fit in the opening
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Wohl
